author: [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/)
title: Odd AI: played Cruel Edict when there were no creatures to sacrifice
content:
_From [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/) on August 24, 2013 02:06:42_
